summary.span: 會將基底類別 (Base Class) 提供給使用強制回應對話方塊以顯示與 ActiveX 控制項屬性頁相似之屬性頁的編輯器。

span.span: Provides a base class for editors that use a modal dialog to display a properties page similar to an ActiveX control's property page.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的範例實作。The following code example demonstrates an example implementation.
